system.description:
This spell restores one full level of experience lost due to energy drain (such as from a vampire's attack). It does not provide additional levels if no level has been lost.

Limitations:

  • Only one level is restored per casting.
  • It cannot restore more than one level, nor increase a level beyond what was originally lost.

Cost to the Cleric:

  • Upon casting, the cleric temporarily loses one experience level, as if struck by a wight.
  • The cleric’s loss is not permanent—it is recovered after resting for [[/r 2d10 #days]].
system.effect: Restores 1 level lost to energy drain
